title: New Font Release - Milkman
content: Just finished Milkman light, regular, and bold see [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014231547/http:/farm1.static.flickr.com/151/329790768_a4fd1da0b4_o.png) pic for a good overview, and [www.haafe.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014231547/http:/www.haafe.com/) for details! I'm pretty happy with it myself :)
author: chillypepper
